Uses of Class
org.openntf.domino.Database.FTSearchOption

  • Packages that use Database.FTSearchOption 
    Package Description
    org.openntf.domino
    Provides the main interface for org.openntf.domino the OpenSource replacement for lotus.domino java classes

    org.openntf.domino.ext
    Provides extended Domino API functionality

    org.openntf.domino.impl
    Provides the standard implementations for the API

    • Uses of Database.FTSearchOption in org.openntf.domino

    • Uses of Database.FTSearchOption in org.openntf.domino.ext

      Method parameters in org.openntf.domino.ext with type arguments of type Database.FTSearchOption 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DocumentCollection Database.FTSearch(java.lang.String query, int maxDocs, Database.FTSortOption sortOpt, java.util.Set<Database.FTSearchOption> otherOpt)
      The core lotus.domino.Database.FTSearch method takes an int worked out by adding the integer value for all the relevant search and sort options the developer wishes to apply.

      To make code clearer and easier to support, this overloaded method has been added taking a Set of Database.FTSearchOption objects and a Set of Database.FTSortOption.

      The current database must be a Domain Catalog
      DocumentCollection Database.FTSearchRange(java.lang.String query, int maxDocs, Database.FTSortOption sortOpt, java.util.Set<Database.FTSearchOption> otherOpt, int start)
      The core lotus.domino.Database.FTSearch method takes an int worked out by adding the integer value for all the relevant search and sort options the developer wishes to apply.

      To make code clearer and easier to support, this overloaded method has been added taking a Set of Database.FTSearchOption objects and a Set of Database.FTSortOption.

      The current database must be a Domain Catalog
